title: Time Display Format
description: Display format for time values. Controls how times are presented to users, not how they are stored. Storage always uses ISO 8601 (HH:mm:ss or HH:mm:ss.sss). Common formats: HH:mm (24-hour), hh:mm A (12-hour with AM/PM), HH:mm:ss (24-hour with seconds).

x-specs.title: Accept valid time format
x-specs.then: the format is accepted and times display in 12-hour format with AM/PM

x-specs.title: Use default format when not specified
x-specs.given: a time field configuration without format property
x-specs.then: the time is displayed in default 24-hour format (HH:mm)

x-specs.title: Reject invalid format tokens
x-specs.then: validation error is returned with message 'Invalid time format pattern'

x-specs.title: Display with 12-hour format
x-specs.given: a time field with format 'hh:mm A'
x-specs.then: the time is displayed as '02:30 PM'
